name: 1-Bit TSA Randomizer
description:
1-Bit TSA Randomizer

The TSA payed a lot of money for an app to randomize a queue for you to use at

airport security. A TSA agent taps the screen and it points left or right.

For the itch.io bit jam the same app is created using a 1 bit display.

Manual

On load you'll be presented with a black screen. Tap any key and the screen will

begin to flash after 10 flashes it will stop on a color. Black or White.

  • If the screen is white please head to the Left Queue.
  • If the screen is black please head to the Right Queue.
